data.comment: The big names in today's match at Emirates Stadium have now been confirmed.
Today's referee, Michael Oliver, has blown to start the match.
In the minute 1, Corner awarded to Wolverhampton.
Arsenal have a goal kick.
Michael Oliver signals a free kick to Arsenal in their own half.
In the minute 5, Arsenal have been awarded a corner by Michael Oliver.
Raul Jimenez is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured David Luiz.
Free kick for Wolverhampton in their own half.
David Luiz is back on his feet again.
In the minute 15, Raul Jimenez, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Fabio Silva is the substitute for Wolverhampton.
In the minute 17, Arsenal awarded a free kick in their own half.
Wolverhampton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Arsenal at Emirates Stadium.
In the minute 18, Free kick for Arsenal in their own half.
Michael Oliver signals a throw-in for Arsenal, close to Wolverhampton's area.
Goal kick for Wolverhampton at Emirates Stadium.
In the minute 19, Arsenal's Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang has run offside.
Michael Oliver signals a free kick to Wolverhampton in their own half.
Michael Oliver awards Wolverhampton a goal kick.
In the minute 24, Michael Oliver signals a free kick to Wolverhampton.
Michael Oliver awards the away team a throw-in.
Michael Oliver signals a Arsenal throw-in in Wolverhampton's half.
In the minute 26, Ball safe as Wolverhampton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Wolverhampton's Leander Dendoncker gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Pedro Neto puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 0-1.
In the minute 29, Can Arsenal get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Wolverhampton's half?
Arsenal have been awarded a corner by Michael Oliver.
Goal! The home team draw level at 1-1 through a header from Gabriel Magalhaes.
In the minute 30, Willian with an assist there.
Throw-in for Wolverhampton in their own half.
Wolverhampton awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 32, In London a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in for Wolverhampton in the half of Arsenal.
Wolverhampton push forward at Emirates Stadium and Fabio Silva gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Arsenal defence.
In the minute 34, Corner awarded to Wolverhampton.
Leander Dendoncker (Wolverhampton) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
Throw-in Arsenal.
In the minute 38, Corner awarded to Arsenal.
Wolverhampton awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Arsenal.
In the minute 39, Wolverhampton to take a throw-in in Arsenal territory.
Michael Oliver awards the home team a throw-in.
Michael Oliver signals a free kick to Wolverhampton in their own half.
In the minute 42, Pedro Neto for Wolverhampton drives towards goal at Emirates Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Goal! The away team take a 1-2 lead through Daniel Podence.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 44, Can Arsenal capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In London Arsenal attack through David Luiz. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Wolverhampton goal kick.
In the minute 45, The 1st half is prolonged by 10 minutes of added time.
In London Wolverhampton drive forward through Fabio Silva. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang gets his shot on target but fails to score for Arsenal.
In the minute 45, Wolverhampton have been awarded a corner by Michael Oliver.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Wolverhampton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 45, Adama Traore for Wolverhampton gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in London.
In the minute 45, Arsenal's Dani Ceballos looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Hector Bellerin for Arsenal is whistled offside.
Wolverhampton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
The match at Emirates Stadium has been interrupted briefly for a check on Dani Ceballos, who is down injured.
The second-half is now underway.
In the minute 46, Can Arsenal get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Wolverhampton's half?
Ball goes out of play for a Wolverhampton goal kick.
Rob Holding is on a sub for David Luiz for Arsenal.
Free kick Arsenal.
Free kick for Wolverhampton in their own half.
In the minute 47, Willy Boly is booked for the away team.
Throw-in for Wolverhampton in the half of Arsenal.
In the minute 48, Michael Oliver signals a free kick to Arsenal in their own half.
Michael Oliver signals a Arsenal throw-in in Wolverhampton's half.
Wolverhampton have been awarded a corner by Michael Oliver.
In the minute 52, In London, Leander Dendoncker of Wolverhampton is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Joao Moutinho (Wolverhampton) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Gabriel Magalhaes is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 54, Gabriel Magalhaes returns to the field for Arsenal after picking up a slight injury.
Goal kick for Arsenal at Emirates Stadium.
Adama Traore (Wolverhampton) has received a yellow card from Michael Oliver.
In the minute 56, Corner awarded to Arsenal.
Free kick for Arsenal in the half of Wolverhampton.
Wolverhampton's Fabio Silva has been booked in London.
In the minute 57, Arsenal's Willian breaks free at Emirates Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Wolverhampton have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Wolverhampton close to the penalty box.
In the minute 60, Important block from the Arsenal defence as Daniel Podence fires in a strike for Wolverhampton.
Wolverhampton to take a throw-in in Arsenal territory.
Free kick for Wolverhampton in the half of Arsenal.
In the minute 62, Wolverhampton to take a throw-in in Arsenal territory.
Michael Oliver signals a Wolverhampton throw-in in Arsenal's half.
Corner awarded to Arsenal.
In the minute 64, Arsenal have been awarded a corner by Michael Oliver.
Arsenal's Rob Holding attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Michael Oliver awards Wolverhampton a goal kick.
In the minute 65, The home team replace Willian with Reiss Nelson.
Can Arsenal get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Wolverhampton's half?
Throw-in for Wolverhampton at Emirates Stadium.
In the minute 69, In London a free kick has been awarded the away team.
At Emirates Stadium, Hector Bellerin has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 70, Throw-in for Arsenal in their own half.
Free kick for Arsenal in their own half.
Ruben Neves is replacing Daniel Podence for the away team.
Wolverhampton needs to be cautious. Arsenal have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 73, Wolverhampton have a dangerous throw-in.
Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang (Arsenal) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 75, Arsenal are coming forward and Reiss Nelson gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in London.
Throw-in for Arsenal in the half of Wolverhampton.
In the minute 77, Michael Oliver signals a Arsenal throw-in in Wolverhampton's half.
Wolverhampton have a goal kick.
Throw-in high up the field for Wolverhampton in London.
In the minute 78, Max Kilman is replacing Fabio Silva for Wolverhampton at Emirates Stadium.
Free kick Wolverhampton.
Can Arsenal capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Wolverhampton's half?
In the minute 80, Arsenal's Joseph Willock gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Wolverhampton defender.
Corner awarded to Arsenal.
In the minute 81, Important block from the Wolverhampton defence as Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang fires in a strike for Arsenal.
Throw-in for Arsenal in the half of Wolverhampton.
The home team have replaced Granit Xhaka with Alexandre Lacazette. This is the third substitution made today by Mikel Arteta.
Arsenal surge into the attack at Emirates Stadium but Pierre-Emerick Aubameyangâ€™s header is off-target.
In the minute 82, Michael Oliver awards Wolverhampton a goal kick.
Wolverhampton awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal kick for Arsenal at Emirates Stadium.
In the minute 85, Ball safe as Arsenal is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Arsenal have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 86, Wolverhampton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Michael Oliver signals a free kick to Wolverhampton.
Rob Holding (Arsenal) has received a first yellow card.
Throw-in for Arsenal in their own half.
In the minute 88, Arsenal have been awarded a corner by Michael Oliver.
Michael Oliver signals a free kick to Arsenal.
Conor Coady for Wolverhampton has been booked by Michael Oliver and receives a first yellow card.
Throw-in for Arsenal close to the penalty box.
Free kick Arsenal.
The fourth official's board shows 4 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in Wolverhampton.
In London a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick for Arsenal in their own half.
Arsenal push forward at Emirates Stadium and Kieran Tierney gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Wolverhampton defence.
Michael Oliver awards the away team a throw-in.
Michael Oliver blows to end the match. The final score is 1-2.
Kieran Tierney (Arsenal) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
